mapper.select: SELECT a.TENN_SEQ , a.TENN_REC_NOW_CNT FROM TB_COMPAY_TENNANT a WHERE a.COM_CODE = #{comCode} ORDER BY a.TENN_SEQ ASC

SELECT a.HIS_SEQ, a.TENN_SEQ, a.COM_CODE, a.USER_NO, a.REG_ID, a.REG_DATE a.TENN_CNT, a.TENN_PLAY_GUBUN, a.TENN_APPRIVAL, b.CODE_NM FROM TB_COMPAY_TENNANT_HISTORY a, LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE b WHERE a.TENN_PLAY_GUBUN = b.CODE AND TENN_SEQ = #{comCode}

SELECT TENN_SEQ, COM_CODE, TENN_REC_DATE, TENN_REC_COUNT, TENN_REC_PLAY_CNT, TENN_REC_NOW_CNT, TENN_REC_END, TENN_REMARK, REG_ID, REG_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE FROM TB_COMPAY_TENNANT a WHERE TENN_SEQ = #{comCode}

insert.foreach:
INSERT INTO TB_COMPAY_TENNANT(COM_CODE, TENN_REC_DATE, TENN_REC_COUNT, TENN_REC_PLAY_CNT, TENN_REC_NOW_CNT, TENN_REC_END, TENN_REMARK, REG_ID, REG_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{item.comCode}, #{item.tennRecDate}, #{item.tennRecCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{item.tennRecCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', #{item.tennRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate() );
INSERT INTO TB_COMPAY_TENNANT_HISTORY (COM_CODE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, TENN_CNT, TENN_PLAY_GUBUN, TENN_APPRIVAL,TENN_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.comCode}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{item.tennRecCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'TENN_PLAY_GUBUN_1', 'Y', (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(TENN_SEQ),1) FROM tb_compay_tennant WHERE COM_CODE = #{item.comCode} ) )

update.if:
INSERT INTO TB_COMPAY_TENNANT_HISTORY (TENN_SEQ, COM_CODE, USER_NO, REG_DATE, TENN_CNT, TENN_PLAY_GUBUN, TENN_APPRIVAL, RES_SEQ) SELECT TENN_SEQ, COM_CODE, USER_NO, REG_DATE, TENN_CNT, 'TENN_PLAY_GUBUN_3', TENN_APPRIVAL, RES_SEQ FROM TB_COMPAY_TENNANT_HISTORY WHERE RES_SEQ = #{tenn.resSeq};
UPDATE TB_COMPAY_TENNANT SET a.TENN_REC_PLAY_CNT = a.TENN_REC_PLAY_CNT - b.TENN_CNT , a.TENN_REC_NOW_CNT = a.TENN_REC_NOW_CNT + b.TENN_CNT , UPDATE_DATE = getdate() , UPDATE_ID = #{tenn.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from TB_COMPAY_TENNANT a, TB_COMPAY_TENNANT_HISTORY b WHERE a.COM_CODE = b.COM_CODE AND a.TENN_SEQ = b.TENN_SEQ AND b.TENN_PLAY_GUBUN = 'TENN_PLAY_GUBUN_2' AND b.RES_SEQ = #{tenn.resSeq};
